
```{r}
erasmus <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2022/2022-03-08/erasmus.csv')
```

```{r}
head(erasmus)
slice_sample(erasmus)
unique(erasmus$receiving_country_code)


erasmusclean <- erasmus %>% 
  mutate(Country = countrycode(receiving_country_code, origin = "eurostat", destination = "country.name"))
  

filter(project_reference=="2017-2-TR01-KA347-046983") %>% 
  #filter(mobility_duration>30) %>% 
  group_by(project_reference,mobility_duration) %>% 
  count(participants, sort=TRUE)

erasmusclean2 <- erasmus %>% 
  #filter(project_reference=="2017-2-TR01-KA347-046983") %>% 
  #filter(mobility_duration>30) %>% 
  group_by(project_reference) %>% 
  count(mobility_duration, sort=TRUE)

erasmusclean3 <- erasmus %>% 
  #filter(project_reference=="2017-2-TR01-KA347-046983") %>% 
  filter(mobility_duration>7) %>% 
  group_by(sending_country_code) %>% 
  count(mobility_duration, sort=TRUE)

library(countrycode)
guess_field(erasmus$sending_country_code)
```
